caption: Rafi was super kind & helpful, we had no idea what we wanted and he gave us plenty of time, he also was kind enough to help us substitute ingredients in our smoothies. 10/10! 🙌
Good smoothies and good service
Pre ordered and it was ready before the full 10 minutes so that was nice
Always quick service and very friendly!
I'm so addicted to this place. Well maybe. I love it!!!
My daughter was in today and said the server, London, just made her day with his friendliness and optimism.  What a happy person who made a real impression.

Caleb at the Gaithersburg location was amazing. Friendly, helpful and great service! We stopped twice. Mozzarella grilled cheese sandwich nd a triple berry smoothie. Then the second go round we got a Turkey bacon ranch sandwich, and a Chipotle chicken flatbread with TWO triple berry smoothies. Tehe. ;-) First time here and we are excited to check out the location in Hagerstown MD.
Fast efficient online rapid pickup. Friendly faces. Great smoothies 🥤😃

username: Day In The Life Of LISA

caption: Landon has amazing customer service! I just know anytime he’s there my order is going to be exactly how I want it. I appreciate this type of service. Thank you!
Great service, fantastic smoothies

Highly recommend! In the world of COVID-19,  where health is extremely important  and eating healthy with a healthy lifestyle is key in staying alive, and these folks are working hard to give you a healthy experience.
Fantastic service!! They go above and beyond to make you smile even during the pandemic they're rolling with the punches and making delicious food and smoothies! 6 stars 🌟 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟
Glad to see that they are open again. They deliver which is a huge perc. Highly recommend this place!!
Awesome smoothies and great Cesar wrap! Highly recommend
Really love their smoothies and there food. Best place to go for something refreshing.

Ordered two sandwiches without avacado And one was still put on than told me if I didn’t like it they do not do returns. Establishment is usually nice and friendly but I won’t be returning after this incident poor customer service and FYI customers satisfaction should always come 1st.
Best smoothies with a fabulous staff!!

This is actually the first review I have ever written. I was absolutely blown away by the amazing customer service that this location provided. I placed an order with Postmates for pick up and was never notified that Postmates cancelled my order. When I showed up, Rafik offered to make my order anyway and give it to me free of charge! They turned what could have been an awful experience into a great one. I will definitely be revisiting this location and will strongly encourage many others to as well. Thank you so much to Rafik and the rest of the team :)

I have tried hard to not give this location a negative review but unfortunately I have to let others know the staff here just can't get your orders correct. I have been coming since they opened. Initially service was good then it jus plummeted. Late last year I started to infrequently visit since they are ALWAYS getting my smoothie order wrong. The irony is that I order the SAME smoothie EVERY time. I use to visit few times a week. I don't know if it is training issue or understanding issue. I visit other locations sometimes and they get myvorder correct every time. Unfortunate that they are most conveniently located here in Gaithersburg, but they can't get my smoothie order correct. I just visited last week and today they got it wrong again. Thankful for COVID-19 pandemic it has allowed me to make my own fresh fruits and vegetables smoothies the way I like it. Now since everything is reopening I reluctantly visited but no more after this morning. Visit another location for better, more accurate orders.
Staff is amazing, food is great, it’s always clean every time I go in! Overall it’s the best smoothie place ever!!
Delicious and friendly customer service.
Great smoothies, friendly staff and the food is even good. Love it.
Food is always good

Love love love this place!! I always get strawberries, bananas, and dark chocolate and add flax seed because it's good for edema. Not only does this taste amazing it actually helps with my edema!! This is a MUST TRY!!
Good smoothies and sandwiches.
The blue berry bliss was good. It was fruity and not too much ice like some places do.
Great! Whats fast paced workers.
Really good smoothies, and food! Love the employees, they greet you and are super friendly! I take my kids here for lunch and they love it too!

This is by far the best Tropical smoothie I have ever been to. I have been to a couple locations but everything about this location was above and beyond amazing! The staff will greet you as soon as you walk in and make you feel extremely welcomed. Almost like you’re family and they are excited to see you. They are very friendly and helpful from the cashiers to cooks and cleaning staff. You can tell they genuinely care for their customers and their restaurant. This is the cleanest tropical smoothie I have been to. Some of the restaurants I have been to have a little bit of an odor from the supplement powders. This location didn’t even smell compared to the other locations I’ve been to. I got food and a smoothie, everything was on point and amazing!! Best Bahama mama I have ever had! I seriously wish other locations were as great as this one! They definitely have my business and I’ve already encouraged several people to check them out!
This Tropical Smoothie is very consistent and staff is always EXTREMELY nice!
Excellent customer service. Rafik is lucky to have the best staff. Angie and all the staff are very nice and they make you feel comfortable. Will recommend this place. Their food is excellent. 😊😊😊

We came for the Grand Opening & my family still comes in pretty often (We have the app & have racked up lots of reward points).  We've met the owner a few times now & he is always super personable, friendly, smiling & treats you like a long time friend. He offered my little one a cookie but we declined since she wasn't able to chew just yet. Awfully sweet gesture though. The rest of the staff are also very friendly & always make sure to greet you. The food is delicious & the smoothies are super addicting. My husband jokes & tells me to work there so we can get discounts since we are regulars. 🤣
That's my spot😍

Nicole was very helpful and adjusted upon request when making my smoothie. Jaime was also another helpful associate that had great recommendations such as the Jerk Chicken Quesadilla or the Veggie Wrap!
The Best!

Does definition of " Healthy" mean to just fill up the cup with ICE, Water and Sugar to make them look large? Twice I have ordered smoothies from here, both different types and both the times their so called healthy smoothies came loaded with tons of ice, tap water and sugar to the extent of more than 50% i would assume . The actual nutrients -fruits or yogurt r just a spoonful as i saw them preparing myself. I had to tell them to remove the added sugar n put less ice. I understand you need ice in a smoothie but its looks like they are serving smoothie in ice. I guess this is how they conserve their ingredients n make their profits.  On a positive note their staff is very friendly and courteous.

I have been here a few times. the smoothies are always A+. If you get a smoothie that includes a banana, keep in mind to tell them your preference of ripeness, I'm pretty sure if you dont say your preference they throw a green banana in there- which i believe is not most peoples preference. there chips are also really good- I get the salt and vinegar ones. Also the paninis are A+
Jamie,and Nicole made my 1st visit Fantastic! Off the hook! And the Paradise bliss was great! Got to come back!! Ppppeace out Nicole!!
Much better than I expected. Smoothies and wraps were delicious and hit the spot The wait was a bit long, but I won't be deterred. I plan to return.
Went to see what all the fuss about the Acai bowls, and got inside to order, No Acai bowls. Feelings hurt however I did get a jerk chicken wrap and it was very good and the staff was very courteous.

My first experience was with ordering food on door dash and it was quick and delicious. Super affordable. I was curious so my husband and I decided to come in for dinner and you are immediately greeted with smiling faces and a vibrant hello! We pretty much have become regulars. Delicious smoothies and great food. Again the best customer service I think I’ve ever received at any establishment. If I could give this location 10 stars ⭐️ i would. London greeted me tonight and his customer service is out of this world! Positive and kind and really takes the time to connect. I can’t say enough good things! We will be faithful customers! Great job to all of the staff at Gaithersburg Tropical Smoothie!
(Translated by Google) Delicious  (Original) Delicioso
Service was great and employees very cordial!! Looking forward to my next visit!!
Always exceeds my expectation

I have been a loyal customer since they opened. Always great service, smiles and greetings galore and the best smoothies in Maryland. Unfortunately, I will no longer be working next door due to a transfer, but I will definitely be back when I'm in the area. Best of luck to you guys.. I will miss you!
Very fresh. Excellent meal and smoothies
Takes to long and people get food and drinks before us after we ordered first
Love it
Great  drinks I get the tai chx wrap it Is great
4 employees. I was the only customer... nearly 2 min to acknowledge my presence. Smoothie was good
Awesome staff💕

I absolutely LOVE this place. The service is always spectacular! Every time I come in, they greet me as if I’m family! I really appreciate the service they provide. I don’t remember his name but, he helped me make modifications on my meal because I don’t eat pork. These employees deserve Five stars TIMES TEN !!
London is the only person that does anything.  Without him I’m pretty sure my drink would have taken 40 mins versus the 10.  Watched him make about 8 drinks while some other guy and gal made 1.

I was not impressed with the customer service. No one wears gloves. I saw one employee untangling her hair around the food that was being prepped, then didn'0t wash her hands and pulled someone's food out of the toaster. A customer was taking so long, and no one else in the background offered any help, or acknowledged me. Someone came in after me, and got their food before me.

What a wonderful place !!!! I am a huge observative person when it comes to restaurants , customer service and food. Every restaurant I go with family or friends I always find something that disappointed me but this place was omg the whole opposite thing . From arriving to leaving. The staff was always smiling (very busy) but always interacting with customers and giving their best at every moment. The Managet Rafi was phenomenal WAY TO GO!!! An outstanding leader , he was so on top of the game with customers and his team , like you would know that he’s the leader (not the manager or the boss) the LEADER!!! The restaurant was spotless, music on point , atmosphere was so comfortable, great flow with customers, no bottle necks at all, everything was so smooth. Food was absolutely delicious and the smoothies the most refreshing healthy one I’ve had. After coming from my sons soccer game , one of the coaches said let’s go to eat at Tropical Smoothie Cafe and I was like “Boy I want real food” and surprisingly your food didn’t just met my expectations on flavor but on calories since I always track what I eat and you were actually on my app menu “in love” I know this is a big review, I’m happy you guys exist , this is what I call eating amazing food at an amazing place with amazing people !!!! Thank you Keep it up guys !!!  Gabby
Omg I don’t know where to start. Very organized, the staff is cool, very welcoming. I been to different locations and I absolutely disliked everything about it.  This is the best location periodT.
The smoothies are huge! I stopped in here the week it opened. Great food, friendly staff. Definitely would recommend. And make sure you have the app/ barcode ready to scan!
love the customer service! employees are super friendly and the smoothies are delicious:)

Had the best experience w my 2 kids. The customer service, team chemistry and culture was great. They even forgot to put in one of our orders...and brought it out on the house. I'll be back easily once a week, if not more
My first time here n staff was very friendly and smoothies are delicious. Will definitely be visiting tropical smoothie again very soon!!
Rafi is the nicest person ever & so is everyone else on the team. They’re really good at conversing with me while still working hard! 10/10 location.
Have been here several times this week for lunch and the service and food is excellent.

We've been here twice already. I dont think the staff are very trained, yet. My husbands quesadilla - the end pieces had nothing in them. My hummus wrap - you couldn't even tell there was hummus in it at all, and instead of the flavored rice, it had plain white rice. Zeeeero flavor. I took it home to jazz it up, myself. And the slaw cups had all of one forkfull and the apples in it were rubbery. We used to go to the one in Columbia several times a month and were PUMPED it opened in GBurg. But I'm not sure we'll be back.
